features: Remedy for Eye and Face: The Ice Face Mask helps soothe and refresh tired, dull skin, leaving you with a radiant and youthful glow. Cold therapy helps to reduce dry eyes, dry skin, and migraines. Use as a therapeutic aid for sleep improvement, No more dark circles! Also used to naturally shrink pores, calm acne-prone skin, or for pore opening before a deep clean and makeup application. It can also be used for post-wisdom tooth surgery, plastic surgery, fever, shoulder, neck, and back tension.

Cold & Hot Compress Methods: Filled with Gel beads it can be used as a hot pack or a cold pack. Simply store the cooling masks in the freezer at -18℃ or lower temperature for at least 2 hours. For better effect, the best freezing time is 2-6 hours. Heat the cooling face mask in a microwave for 10-15-second intervals until the desired temperature is achieved. The maximum heating time does not exceed 30 seconds.

Multipurpose and Reusable: Our ice face mask can be used for a variety of purposes, including skincare, pain relief, and stress management. It's also reusable, and contains gel beads of massage, which have a good temperature storage effect, strong fluidity, and softness against the skin.100% pressure testing, no break, no leakage, long lifetime.

Adjustable and Comfortable: Adjustable Fit for Maximum Comfort. This ice face mask is designed to fit all face shapes and sizes, with adjustable straps that allow you to customize the fit to your comfort level. The soft, flexible material conforms to your face for optimal results.

Reliable Material: The extra small gel pack is widely used. The reusable gel packs are great for first aid or for home, school, or office use. High-performance environmentally friendly PVC,90KG pressure test, strong seal, leak-proof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used this ice face mask after having a chemical peel done on my face, and I am very happy with the way this helped me heal. This mask is comfortable and stayed cold. I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and multitask with
reviews.reviewText: The mask is super easy to wear during everyday tasks! It stays frozen/cold for a good amount of time and hits all spots on the face! It also feels very nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love this face mask. It really works with making my pores smaller than they ever were. Since I turned 40 I noticed my pores larger than they ever been. I did my research and tried everything. I saw this face mask and wanted to try it out. It actually worked and just so easy to use. Definitely recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mask to use post nose job surgery. It did not work out well for me because the nose piece is very limited on how it moves however the mask itself is designed nice and the gel beads inside are very soft making it a comfortable mask to have on your face instead of a sheet of hard ice like other masks when frozen. Has an adjustable strap would be perfect to use after doing a nice skin care routine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mask works great for my 27 year old. Fits her face well and retains the cold for some time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love the ease of wearing this mask. I try to use it 3-4 times a week. I will put in the freezer for about 15-30 minutes while I wash my face. Then I will place the mask on, which is very easy to do, and leave on my face for 30 minutes. I usually lay on the couch and watch some tv or read a book while I let the mask do its magic. I love how it tightens the skin and reduces my pores. I will also place over a treated mask to aid in my skin capturing the benefits from the mask. After I am done, I simply rinse off and then dry and then put in the refrigerator until I am ready to use it again. I am 51 years old and not that I should know what 51 should look like but I don't think I look 51. The price was just right too! Didn't have to spend and arm and a leg to get great benefits.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good quality but not one size fits all
reviews.reviewText: The quality is great, but it does not cover the whole face, it does not reach the sides of the face especially if you have a round face. Also when placed in a freezer for too long, it is impossible to mold it to the shape of the face because the frozen beads don’t move well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits my face well
reviews.reviewText: The cutouts in the face mask are well-placed, although the nose is a little low. It's nice that there's a flap to cover the nose too, though. It folds around my face well. I keep this mask in the fridge and use it for a few minutes after showers to decrease facial inflammation. It works great.
